parameters.name: ApiFormat
parameters.description: The API.

parameters.name: ApiId
parameters.description: The ID of the event-related API.

parameters.name: ApiTag
parameters.description:
The business purpose of the API.

>  You can call the [DescribeApisecRules](~~2859155~~) operation to query the business purposes of APIs.

parameters.name: AttackIp
parameters.description: The Attack source IP.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the hybrid cloud cluster.

>  This parameter is available only in hybrid cloud scenarios. You can call the [DescribeHybridCloudClusters](~~2849376~~) operation to query hybrid cloud clusters.

parameters.name: EndTs
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp in UTC. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description: The ID of the API security event.

parameters.name: EventLevel
parameters.description:
The severity level of the event. Valid values:

*   **high**
*   **medium**
*   **low**

parameters.name: EventTag
parameters.description:
The type of the event.

>  You can call the [DescribeApisecRules](~~2859155~~) operation to query the supported event types.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: MatchedHost
parameters.description: The domain name or IP address of the API.

parameters.name: OrderKey
parameters.description:
The name of the sorting field. Valid values:

*   **allCnt**: the number of attacks
*   **startTs**: the start time of the event
*   **endTs**: the end time of the event

parameters.name: OrderWay
parameters.description:
The sorting method. Valid values:

*   **desc** (default): descending order
*   **asc**: ascending order

parameters.name: Origin
parameters.description:
The source of the event type. Valid values:

*   **custom**
*   **default**

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Value:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: StartTs
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp in UTC. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: UserStatus
parameters.description:
The event status. Valid values:

*   **toBeConfirmed**
*   **confirmed**
*   **ignored**
